data.title: Who is Anthony Taylor?
data.meta_description: ANTHONY Taylor is well known in the world of boxing.But who is he and when is he returning to the ring?Who is Anthony Taylor and where is he from?Anth
data.text:
ANTHONY Taylor is well known in the world of boxing.

But who is he and when is he returning to the ring?

Who is Anthony Taylor and where is he from?

Anthony Taylor is a professional boxer.

He is also known as "Pretty Boy" on his social media accounts.

Taylor was born in Berkeley in the US, on June 23, 1989, and made his boxing debut in 2017.

In 2021 Taylor was working as sparring partner for YouTuber and celebrity boxer Jake Paul.

He told Betway Insider: “I’m getting paid more money as Jake’s training partner in two months than I made in my whole entire MMA career in six years.

"I swear to god, I made more money with Jake in two months than my whole MMA career"

What is Anthony Taylor's fight record?

Taylor has had five fights as of May 2023, although he hasn't been in the ring for an official fight since 2021.

He lost his debut fight against Donte Stubbs and was also defeated by Tommy Fury in 2021.

He then had two wins under his belt against Juan Manuel Rodriguez Chavez and Jose Camargo Cabanez, before another loss to Chris Avila in December 2021.

He lost to Idris Virgo in an exhibition bout at Misfits series 004 in January 2023.

His next fight is against TikTok influencer Salt Papi as part of the Misfit Boxing MF & DAZN X Series 7 on Saturday, May 13, 2023.

Taylor said on Instagram about his upcoming fight: "I ain't losing to Peppa Pig Papi."

Singer and rapper KSI will headline the Misfit Boxing 007 together with boxer Joe Fournier at the OVO Arena in Wembley.

Taylor and Salt Papi's fight is part of the undercard, plus the following fights:

Deji Olatunji v Swarmz

ViruZz v DK Money

Tennessee Thresh v Paigey Cakey

Lil Bellsy v Lil Kymchii

Wings v Boogie

Corn v Unbaer

Luis Nestor v Archie

Mams Taylor, Co-President of Misfits Boxing said: “Here we go!

"What a fight and what a night of crossover boxing this will be.

"KSI against Joe Fournier is huge, it’s mammoth and it’s guaranteed to deliver a night that London will never forget.”

Is Anthony Taylor married and does he have children?

As of May 2023 Anthony Taylor is not married or in a relationship.

Taylor also does not have any children.
